author: Staff Reporter
text:
R. Pavithra (12) of Pichanur near Coimbatore, who took ill after consuming food at her house a couple of days ago, died on Tuesday. K.G. Chavadi Police said that the girl was treated in a nearby clinic and was referred to the Coimbatore Medical College Hospital on Tuesday.

She died on the way to hospital.
title: Girl dies of food poisoning
